author: ghyls
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a commit on top of [#42594](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42594), with the aim of preparing the code in #42594 to get merged. The changes proposed by #42594 are:

- Replace the current [`HeterogeneousCore/MPICore/test/testMPI.cc`](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/HeterogeneousCore/MPICore/test/testMPI.cc) with a more comprehensive test, including among others one sided MPI communication methods.

#### PR validation:

The test introduced by this PR passes.
title: Update MPI Test software
